The claim was made in an email blast fro: executive director of Texas Right to Life, stating that University of Texas students signed a petition seeking the legal right to abort newborn babies up to five years old.
The claim was supported by a video poste: com, showing a man collecting signatures on the alleged petition at the University of Texas in Austin.
The video displayed an unsigned version: stating that killing a newborn could be ethically permissible until the child is self-aware or reaches 5 years old.
The video mentioned a student: written story posted online, claiming that support for post-birth abortions had been noted among college students at other universities across the United States.
